caption.p:
The relationship between exponential rates of increase with age of all-cause mortality and COVID-19 mortality for countries in the Human Mortality Database. (Note that exponential rates are calculated from age groups 45 to 49 y to 85 to 89 y for all-cause mortality and ages 40 to 49 y to 80
+
y for COVID-19 mortality, assuming 40-y ranges for both.)
